title: Microsoft says Windows 11 is ready for broad deployment
content:
Windows 11 is now ready for broad deployment in business environments, Microsoft has announced through its release health information page. That means anyone with a PC that meets the minimum requirements for Windows 11 should be able to safely install it. Microsoft says there may still be safeguard holds on specific devices, however. Microsoft officially

The post Microsoft says Windows 11 is ready for broad deployment appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft has announced that Windows 11 is now ready for broad deployment, and any compatoble device should be able tpo upgrade to it.
